fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance professionalism with readability, using familiar and web-safe fonts.
fontTheory.readability: Careful consideration was given to font families that are easy to read on screens and in print.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Headings stand out in Arial for a modern touch, while body text is set in Georgia for a classic look. Monospace fonts enhance readability for technical content.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial as headings complement Georgia in body text, providing a clear visual distinction. Courier New ensures code blocks are easily distinguished.
